amendment.description: To modify the immigration benefits for which certain Afghan nationals are eligible.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3833 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 394.

action.text: Amendment SA 3833 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Cotton to Amendment SA 3830. (consideration: CR S6804-6805, S6808; text: CR S6804-6805) To modify the immigration benefits for which certain Afghan nationals are eligible.
